name: Ordovician
description:
Ordovician - generative primevil sea creatures

--------------------------------------------------

Sit back and watch the procedurally generated Ordovician sea.

Made for Procjam 2015

https://itch.io/jam/procjam

Code/Art etc by Tom Betts

www.nullpointer.co.uk

Audio Soundtrack by VDU

http://www.visualdisplayunit.org/

Underwater loop from

https://freesound.org/people/scratchikken/sounds/1...

You can actually press 'r' to force regeneration of the beasites, but its kind of nice to let them do it themselves.
